subject: Hockey, Ice
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: By the end of the season, the Islanders hope to have at least one of their games telecast in China, part of an effort by owner Charles B. Wang to bring hockey to the country.
snippet: By the end of the season, the Islanders hope to have at least one of their games telecast in China, part of an effort by owner Charles B. Wang to bring hockey to the country.
